name: Online Word Search
description:
Are you ready to show off your full power in word search games against the real players?

The dearest of die-hard word search game fans is now on mobile platforms for you to compete with your friends and other online players. With people all around the world, in any language you pick, you can kick off a word search and show the others your true power.

With its unlimited number of puzzle games and above 40.000 words vocab Online Word Search is number one when it comes to expanding the vocabulary of both young and old. Since Multi-language is supported, you can both improve your foreign languages and have good a time.

Download Online Word Search now for learning while playing exciteful games!


FEATURES
• More than 40.000 words and unlimited number of puzzles
• Live and real-time duel with your friends
• Weekly scoreboards and overall standings
• Simple and plain design
• Multi-language support
developers: RUBY OYUN VE YAZILIM DANISMANLIK SANAYI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
publishers: RUBY OYUN VE YAZILIM DANISMANLIK SANAYI TICARET LIMITED SIRKETI
